mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_DETAIL, TO_CHAR(NOTICE_UPLOAD_DATE, 'YYYY. MM. DD') NOTICE_UPLOAD_DATE FROM NOTICE_BOARD ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC

SELECT A.NOTICE_NO, A.NOTICE_TITLE, A.NOTICE_DETAIL, A.NOTICE_UPLOAD_DATE, A.PRE_NOTICE_NO, A.PRE_NOTICE_TITLE, A.NEXT_NOTICE_NO, A.NEXT_NOTICE_TITLE FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_DETAIL, TO_CHAR(NOTICE_UPLOAD_DATE, 'YYYY. MM. DD') NOTICE_UPLOAD_DATE , LAG(NOTICE_NO) OVER (ORDER BY NOTICE_NO) PRE_NOTICE_NO , LAG(NOTICE_TITLE) OVER (ORDER BY NOTICE_NO) PRE_NOTICE_TITLE , LEAD(NOTICE_NO) OVER (ORDER BY NOTICE_NO) NEXT_NOTICE_NO , LEAD(NOTICE_TITLE) OVER (ORDER BY NOTICE_NO) NEXT_NOTICE_TITLE FROM NOTICE_BOARD ORDER BY NOTICE_NO ) A WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE_BOARD SET NOTICE_TITLE = #{noticeTitle}, NOTICE_DETAIL = #{noticeDetail}, NOTICE_UPLOAD_DATE = DEFAULT WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
